title: ReDone: Skyrim Ultimate Modded - Legendary Epic Edition
description:
Howdy bay peoples,

The ReDone version of the Ultimate Modded EPIC Edition has finally arrived!
It can be used as standalone (crack and more files now included).
-Can also be used on ANY Steam with OR without ANY DLC.

Also included a Performance Edition for people getting little FPS.
Depth of Field package included too (and type explanation).

-PLEASE, PLEASE read all included 'Readme' files carefully!
They give a much better overview of the mods (they are much better now).
It will you take you much less time then it took me to create it all.
They give you a good idea of what all mods do & to avoid potential bugs & CTDs.

-If you like this collection, let me know :)

Should you have any further questions, ask me in the comment section.
Will try to check back every few hours (and please, read all included readmes).

-Powerful PC required!

-Those that used my old version, remove it completely & make a new save.
I apologize for the inconvenience! Please do not try to load & play old saves.

Much greetings & enjoy.
ExtremeModder


Notable Points:
(Compared to previous version)
----------------------------------
-Many bug fixes.
-Much less potential CTDs.
-Further & final editing of (facial) shadows.
-More mods added (Immersion/Gameplay).
-Much better & more clear Readmes (Please read them all).
-More room for personal mods (16 maximum, that use ESPs).
-Merged patches to speed up loading times & allow more mods.
-Many tweaks enhancing the world & NPC AI fixes.
-All facial & body animations in NPC heavy areas are now fixed.
-Much better Readme files.


The Collection:
----------------------------------
Spend nearly 2 months now checking all sites, especially Nexus, for mods that would make the Skyrim experience a truly epic one. All mods are based on Realism/Immersion - no crazy fantasy mods here! It substantially makes the graphics look far better in every aspect & literally EVERYTHING in the game has been modded somehow for the better, not to mention the countless compatibility patches & cleaned master files/mods. Enjoy Skyrim at it's now MAXIMUM potential!


Pictures Of The Mod:
----------------------------------


ENB Used:
----------------------------------
RealVision ENB (Personally edited)
Please do not change the ENB, unless wanting potential bugs.
(Optionally use included Performance Edition for people with low FPS).
